short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to remove YouTube recommended videos, video suggestions,  homepage related videos, trending tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a browser extension that eliminates distractions on YouTube. 
This extension removes various elements such as the recommended sidebar, video suggestions, homepage  feed and trending tab. 

Don't let YouTube consume your time. You can enable or disable the tool with a simple click. 

This extension is also compatible with the browser Opera!
